title: Reasoning, Argumentation and Professional Writing
description: The principles of reasoning in professional writing. Discussion and application of rhetorical principles, both oral and written, in professional environments. Study of methods, resources and common formats used in corporate or research writing. 4 lectures. Crosslisted as ENGL/HNRSÂ 148. Fulfills GE A3.
prerequisites: Completion of GE Area A1 with a C- or better, or consent of instructor
